text: An advanced, hybrid C++/Go/Python tool to hunt down leaked secrets in your
codebase and Git history. It combines high-performance file scanning with
intelligent rule-based detection and entropy analysis.
[cyan]<PATH>[/]                File or directory to scan (default: current directory).
[green]--scan-git[/]            [bold]Git Mode.[/] Scans the repository's history instead of the filesystem.
[green]--depth <N>[/]            In Git Mode, limit scan to the last N commits (default: 100).
[green]-r, --rules <FILE>[/]      Path to a custom JSON rules file.
[green]--confidence <lvl>[/]   Minimum confidence to report: [cyan]low, medium, high[/] (default: low).
[green]-o, --output <FILE>[/]   Save the report to a file (formats: [cyan]json, csv[/]).
